sentences.english: Can a woman forget her sucking child, that she should not have compassion on the son of her womb?
sentences.chinese: 婦人焉能忘記他喫奶的嬰孩，不憐恤他所生的兒子。

sentences.english: Blessed are the merciful: for they shall obtain mercy.
sentences.chinese: 憐恤人的人有福了，因爲他們必蒙憐恤。

sentences.english: Blessed are the merciful: for they shall obtain mercy.
sentences.chinese: 憐恤人的人有福了，因爲他們必蒙憐恤。

sentences.english: But you, O Lord , have mercy on me; raise me up, that I may repay them.
sentences.chinese: 耶和華阿，求你憐恤我，使我起來，好報復他們。

sentences.english: He made them also to be pitied of all those that carried them captives.
sentences.chinese: 他也使他們在凡擄掠他們的人面前蒙憐恤。

sentences.english: God's attitude to Ninevah was one of mercy and compassion if they would only repent.
sentences.chinese: 只要城中的居民願意悔改，神仍然願意憐恤他們。

sentences.english: He will take pity on the weak and the needy and save the needy from death.
sentences.chinese: 他要憐恤貧寒和窮乏的人，拯救窮苦人的性命。

sentences.english: But thou, O LORD, be merciful unto me, and raise me up, that I may requite them.
sentences.chinese: 耶和華阿，求你憐恤我，使我起來，好報復他們。

sentences.english: They shall not pity the widow, nor do good to the fatherless.
sentences.chinese: 不知憐恤寡婦，也不知加惠孤兒。

sentences.english: Then will the LORD be jealous for his land, and pity his people.
sentences.chinese: 耶和華就爲自己的地發熱心，憐恤他的百姓。

sentences.english: He shall spare the poor and needy, and shall save the souls of the needy.
sentences.chinese: 他要憐恤貧寒和窮乏的人，拯救窮苦人的性命。

sentences.english: We are supposed to have compassion, kindness, lowliness, meekness, long-suffering.
sentences.chinese: 我們應該擁有憐恤的心腸，恩慈，卑微，溫柔，恆忍。

sentences.english: Turn thee unto me, and have mercy upon me; for I am desolate and afflicted.
sentences.chinese: 求你轉向我，憐恤我，因爲我是孤獨困苦。

definition: Chakravarti raja (Sanskrit: King of Kings)/emperor in Hindu mythology
to feel compassion for/to pity on/to feel sorry for
to nail securely/to execute by means of impalement/to crucify
to start rumours and create trouble
a clever person may become the victim of his own ingenuity (idiom); cleverness may overreach itself/too smart for one's own good
pinyin: cong1 ming2 fan3 bei4 cong1 ming2 wu4

definition: to keep on the right side of everyone (idiom)/warm and affable
